Hymn.Arabic: أَنْتَ حَظِي يَا رَبُّ. فَقُلْتُ أَنْ أَحْفَظ وَصَايَاكَ.
Hymn.English: 57 You are my portion, O Lord; I have said that I would keep Your words.

Hymn.Arabic: تَوَسَّلْتُ إِلَى وَجْهِكَ بِكُلِّ قَلْبِي. ارْحَمْنِي كَقَوْلِكَ هَلِلُويَا.
Hymn.English: 58 I entreated Your favor with my whole heart; Be merciful to me according to Your word.     Alleluia
